title: Good counsells for the peace of reformed churches by some reverend and learned bishops and other divines ; translated out of Latine.
author: Dury, John, 1596-1680.
publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield for William Webb,
notes: Attributed to John Dury. cf. Madan 997.
Includes essays by John Davenant, Thomas Morton, Joseph Hall, Ussher, and French divines.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
